subject: Plus x pedals
description_text:
Yes i just gor my plus x pedals today and it's rlthev3 pedals setup, but
the mounting hardware to mount the pedals to the plate and a spacer is
missing for the lift plate

conversations.body_text: Hi Trent Justice,     We apologize for not fully understanding your issue. Could you please send us a photo showing the missing part? We will ship a replacement to you, please don't worry.

Its the bolts and nuts that mount the pedals to the base plate for all 3
pedals, I can't send a picture because they weren't included so I can't mou
t the pedals at the moment

On Mon, Nov 10, 2025, 8:56 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Trent Justice,  Could you please take a few photos of all the products you received? I’ll help you check if anything is missing, and we’ll send the missing parts to you as soon as possible.
